===Etymology===
{{bor|zh|en|Holmes}}, with influence from [[Amoy]] {{etyl|nan|-}} in the translation by Huang Ding ({{lang|zh|黃鼎}}) and Zhang Zaixin ({{lang|zh|張在新}}), with the form {{lang|zh|福而摩司}} {{defdate|1902}}, which was changed to the current form in {{lang|zh|《續包探案》}} {{defdate|1903}}.
